Landing Callout (Video or Infographic)

This component is used to promote a single piece of video or infographic content to a Landing page.

Taking Charge

Mayor Rahm Emanuel discusses his Early Childhood Education Initiatives

Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel discusses his early childhood education initiatives at the Ounce of Prevention Fund luncheon, April 24, 2013 - including kindergarten for all children in Chicago, and more preschool services for children in Chicago.
